page.title: 05Home Farm Norman Court
page.content: Home Farm Norman Court is in West Tytherley and is owned by {Mr.A.Bergegren}who is from Sweden.It is an Arable farm of 985 acres and 500 acres of woodland.They use modern machinery including five tractors,one combine and one Volvo BM.The crops grown are wheat,barley,beans and oil seed rape plus some maize for the pheasants.The crops are sown in October,November and March.The harvesting is done in July, August and September.After the harvest the grain is stored in the barn and in the two big silos .The grain is not sold abroad.When the crops are sold they are distributed by contract lorries.The farm has four workers.One of them is a gamekeeper in charge of three thousand young pheasants and two hundred and fifty ducks.
